main_text:
Varieties of Constructive Mathematics
3. Varieties of Constructive Mathematics

The desire to retain the possibility of a computational interpretation
is one motivation for using the constructive reinterpretations of the
logical connectives and quantifiers that we gave above; but it is not
exactly the motivation of the pioneers of constructivism in
mathematics. In this section we look at some of the different
approaches to constructivism in mathematics over the past 130
years.
hierarchy_title: Constructive Mathematics || Varieties of Constructive Mathematics
